ValidationRule.description: Checks if the Valuation Date field is blank when a Finance Summary with Record Type Endowment Fund Summary is created or updated.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( ISNEW(), ISCHANGED( Valuation_Date__c ) ), RecordType.DeveloperName = 'Endowment_Fund_Summary', OR( ISNULL( Valuation_Date__c ), ISBLANK( Valuation_Date__c ) ) )
